WebCamp 2014, Zagreb 04.10.2014.

Tech-oriented conference for
web developers & designers

⋆ 04.10.2014. • Conference center Hypo Expo XII • Slavonska avenija 6 ⋆

Start of WebCamp 2014 preparations.

18.05.2014.

Encouraged by past WebCamp Zagreb success, we are continuing our tradition: organizing a tech orientented conference by the community for the community.

With more than 600 web developers & designers attending last years conference, concept of sharing expiriences & knowledge across different communities in South East Europe becomes even more apparent: we are going all english this year!
